channel.title: CVE Feed for pragmaticmates -- Realia
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pragmaticmates -- Realia

item.title: CVE-2023-4277|2024-08-02T07:24:03.723Z -- pragmaticmates -- realia
item.description: The Realia plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.4.0. This is due to missing nonce validation on the 'process_change_profile_form' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to change user email via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
